articles.title: European Commission accuses Lukashenko government of 'gangster' tactics as Lithuania declares emergency at Belarus border - ABC News
articles.description: The humanitarian crisis on the Belarusian border deepens as thousands wait while EU nations stiffen border patrols and accuse the Belarusian government of "gangster style" behaviour.
articles.content: The crisis on the Belarusian border is worsening with a second adjoining nation declaring a state of emergency and the European Commission accusing Belarus President Alexander Lukashenko and his gove… [+4389 chars]

articles.title: Irish ‘making preparations’ for possible EU-UK trade war - POLITICO Europe

articles.title: Migrants stuck at Poland-Belarus border deal with dropping temperatures as tensions rise - CBC.ca
articles.description: Hundreds of migrants shivered in freezing temperatures and huddled around campfires on the Belarusian border with Poland on Tuesday in front of razor-wire fences and lines of Polish border guards blocking their entry into the European Union.
